Package examples.org.cloudbus.cloudsim.examples.power.planetlab

  • Class Summary
    Class Description
    Dvfs
    A simulation of a heterogeneous power aware data center that only applied DVFS, but no dynamic optimization of the VM allocation.
    IqrMc
    A simulation of a heterogeneous power aware data center that applies the Inter Quartile Range (IQR) VM allocation policy and Maximum Correlation (MC) VM selection policy.
    IqrMc_GA
    A simulation of a heterogeneous power aware data center that applies the Inter Quartile Range (IQR) VM allocation policy and Maximum Correlation (MC) VM selection policy.
    IqrMmt
    A simulation of a heterogeneous power aware data center that applies the Inter Quartile Range (IQR) VM allocation policy and Minimum Migration Time (MMT) VM selection policy.
    IqrMmt_GA
    A simulation of a heterogeneous power aware data center that applies the Inter Quartile Range (IQR) VM allocation policy and Minimum Migration Time (MMT) VM selection policy.
    IqrMu
    A simulation of a heterogeneous power aware data center that applies the Inter Quartile Range (IQR) VM allocation policy and Minimum Utilization (MU) VM selection policy.
    IqrRs
    A simulation of a heterogeneous power aware data center that applies the Inter Quartile Range (IQR) VM allocation policy and Random Selection (RS) VM selection policy.
    IqrRs_GA
    A simulation of a heterogeneous power aware data center that applies the Inter Quartile Range (IQR) VM allocation policy and Random Selection (RS) VM selection policy.
    LrMc
    A simulation of a heterogeneous power aware data center that applies the Local Regression (LR) VM allocation policy and Maximum Correlation (MC) VM selection policy.
    LrMc_GA
    A simulation of a heterogeneous power aware data center that applies the Local Regression (LR) VM allocation policy and Maximum Correlation (MC) VM selection policy.
    LrMmt
    A simulation of a heterogeneous power aware data center that applies the Local Regression (LR) VM allocation policy and Minimum Migration Time (MMT) VM selection policy.
    LrMmt_GA
    A simulation of a heterogeneous power aware data center that applies the Local Regression (LR) VM allocation policy and Minimum Migration Time (MMT) VM selection policy.
    LrMu
    A simulation of a heterogeneous power aware data center that applies the Local Regression (LR) VM allocation policy and Minimum Utilization (MU) VM selection policy.
    LrrMc
    A simulation of a heterogeneous power aware data center that applies the Local Regression Robust (LRR) VM allocation policy and Maximum Correlation (MC) VM selection policy.
    LrrMc_GA
    A simulation of a heterogeneous power aware data center that applies the Local Regression Robust (LRR) VM allocation policy and Maximum Correlation (MC) VM selection policy.
    LrrMmt
    A simulation of a heterogeneous power aware data center that applies the Local Regression Robust (LRR) VM allocation policy and Minimum Migration Time (MMT) VM selection policy.
    LrrMmt_GA
    A simulation of a heterogeneous power aware data center that applies the Local Regression Robust (LRR) VM allocation policy and Minimum Migration Time (MMT) VM selection policy.
    LrrMu
    A simulation of a heterogeneous power aware data center that applies the Local Regression Robust (LRR) VM allocation policy and Minimum Utilization (MU) VM selection policy.
    LrrRs
    A simulation of a heterogeneous power aware data center that applies the Local Regression Robust (LRR) VM allocation policy and Random Selection (RS) VM selection policy.
    LrrRs_GA
    A simulation of a heterogeneous power aware data center that applies the Local Regression Robust (LRR) VM allocation policy and Random Selection (RS) VM selection policy.
    LrRs
    A simulation of a heterogeneous power aware data center that applies the Local Regression (LR) VM allocation policy and Random Selection (RS) VM selection policy.
    LrRs_GA
    A simulation of a heterogeneous power aware data center that applies the Local Regression (LR) VM allocation policy and Random Selection (RS) VM selection policy.
    MadMc
    A simulation of a heterogeneous power aware data center that applies the Median Absolute Deviation (MAD) VM allocation policy and Maximum Correlation (MC) VM selection policy.
    MadMc_GA
    A simulation of a heterogeneous power aware data center that applies the Median Absolute Deviation (MAD) VM allocation policy and Maximum Correlation (MC) VM selection policy.
    MadMmt
    A simulation of a heterogeneous power aware data center that applies the Median Absolute Deviation (MAD) VM allocation policy and Minimum Migration Time (MMT) VM selection policy.
    MadMmt_GA
    A simulation of a heterogeneous power aware data center that applies the Median Absolute Deviation (MAD) VM allocation policy and Minimum Migration Time (MMT) VM selection policy.
    MadMu
    A simulation of a heterogeneous power aware data center that applies the Median Absolute Deviation (MAD) VM allocation policy and Minimum Utilization (MU) VM selection policy.
    MadRs
    A simulation of a heterogeneous power aware data center that applies the Median Absolute Deviation (MAD) VM allocation policy and Random Selection (RS) VM selection policy.
    MadRs_GA
    A simulation of a heterogeneous power aware data center that applies the Median Absolute Deviation (MAD) VM allocation policy and Random Selection (RS) VM selection policy.
    NonPowerAware
    A simulation of a heterogeneous non-power aware data center: all hosts consume maximum power all the time.
    PlanetLabConstants
    If you are using any algorithms, policies or workload included in the power package please cite the following paper: Anton Beloglazov, and Rajkumar Buyya, "Optimal Online Deterministic Algorithms and Adaptive Heuristics for Energy and Performance Efficient Dynamic Consolidation of Virtual Machines in Cloud Data Centers", Concurrency and Computation: Practice and Experience, ISSN: 1532-0626, Wiley Press, New York, USA, 2011, DOI: 10.1002/cpe.1867
    PlanetLabHelper
    A helper class for the running examples for the PlanetLab workload.
    PlanetLabRunner
    The example runner for the PlanetLab workload.
    PlanetLabRunnerConsole
    This is a universal example runner that can be used for running examples from console.
    ThrMc
    A simulation of a heterogeneous power aware data center that applies the Static Threshold (THR) VM allocation policy and Maximum Correlation (MC) VM selection policy.
    ThrMc_GA
    A simulation of a heterogeneous power aware data center that applies the Static Threshold (THR) VM allocation policy and Maximum Correlation (MC) VM selection policy.
    ThrMmt
    A simulation of a heterogeneous power aware data center that applies the Static Threshold (THR) VM allocation policy and Minimum Migration Time (MMT) VM selection policy.
    ThrMmt_GA
    A simulation of a heterogeneous power aware data center that applies the Static Threshold (THR) VM allocation policy and Minimum Migration Time (MMT) VM selection policy.
    ThrMu
    A simulation of a heterogeneous power aware data center that applies the Static Threshold (THR) VM allocation policy and Minimum Utilization (MU) VM selection policy.
    ThrRs
    A simulation of a heterogeneous power aware data center that applies the Static Threshold (THR) VM allocation policy and Random Selection (RS) VM selection policy.
    ThrRs_GA
    A simulation of a heterogeneous power aware data center that applies the Static Threshold (THR) VM allocation policy and Random Selection (RS) VM selection policy.
